product_name: Eagle Creek Tarmac 20 Wide Body Wheeled Luggage - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Sized to fit in most overhead bins without compromising packing space, the Eagle Creek Tarmac 20 Wide Body offers offer high durability and resists wet weather to defy the unexpected. Bi-Tech(TM) fabric is a polyurethane-coated, 900-denier polyester providing exceptional durability and water resistance; fabric is easily cleaned. Main compartment opens wide for easy access when packing and unpacking; 2 interior zippered mesh pockets and a large interior door panel. Interior compression wings condense and protect contents. Exterior quick-stash pocket and large zippered pocket. Lockable, sefl-repairing zippers and finger-friendly zipper pulls (locks sold separately). Oversize super-tread wheels with protective housing guards roll easily over urban obstacles. Tread-grip handle system features soft, molded grips and easy touch-button height adjustment. Rugged corner guards, strategically material blocking, skid plate and front bumper protection enhance Tarmac's durability. Detachable piggyback clip lets you attach another bag, allowing both to be wheeled as 1. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline). Closeout.
short_description: Sized to fit in most overhead bins without compromising packing space, the Eagle Creek Tarmac 20 Wide Body offers offer high durability and resists wet weather to defy the unexpected.
